channel.title: Help a noob plz :(
channel.description:
ok im very very new to running my own rsps and i was wondering peoples opinions on a base for me
im looking for somthing close to 317 base that reflects rs as in npc's somthing i can learn on i just dont like all these custom skilling areas and so on and so forth. ty for the help

item.title: Help a noob plz :(
item.dc:creator: @Ayush_Arya Ayush Arya
item.description:
@Ayush_Arya wrote:

Go to runelocus and then tools, and then own runescape private server.There will be a guide.
I suggest PI,Delta,R~S(RuneSource),DSPK(Not for too new people).
After you’ve learnt I will suggest to use VernixPkz,GazaaScape,AssaultX,Disturbed,InsanityX(Have alot of bugs),InsidiaX(Can’t handle Skillcape shop due to summon cape when you have money in your inventory)

Read full topic

item.title: Help a noob plz :(
item.dc:creator: @wartek wartek
item.description:
@wartek wrote:

I suggest pi…
It’s an easy base and you can learn good habitudes from there, unlike delta ._.

Read full topic
